title: NSF Handoff and Commercial Internet Use
description: The discussion touched upon the National Science Foundation (NSF) relinquishing control of the NSFnet backbone to commercial telecom companies, leading to the legalization of commercial internet use. This transition marked a pivotal moment in internet history, enabling the expansion of commercial activities online and paving the way for the interconnected internet we know today.
